entry.title: L3MON -- SPY APK with kali Linux
entry.content:
Enter your password:

L3MON -- Access Android Devices Remotely | Kali Linux Tutorials
  • Home
  • About
  • Contact
  • Write For Us
  • Privacy Policy
  • Terms & Condition

  • Home
    • Configure
    • Information Gathering
    • Scanning
    • Attacking
    • Forensic
    • Password Attacks
    • Tools
    Home/Attack Strategies/Custom Tools For Kali Linux/L3MON -- Access Android Devices Remotely

    L3MON -- Access Android Devices Remotely

    Attack Strategies, Custom Tools For Kali Linux
    L3MON is a remote Android management suite, we can use it to gain access on any android smartphone. In easy words this is a Android RAT (Remote Administrative Tool).

    In today's detailed tutorial we learn how to install & configure L3MON on our Kali Linux system and use it.

    Using L3MON we can make an Android APK payload and send it to android device and after installing it on android device we can gain the access of Android device via L3MON's web based interface, we can send commands from the easy web based interface and execute our commands on targeted devices.


    L3mon have lots of beautiful features they are following:
    • GPS Logging
    • Microphone Recording
    • View Contacts
    • SMS Logs
    • Send SMS
    • Call Logs
    • View Installed Apps
    • View Stub Permissions
    • Live Clipboard Logging
    • Live Notification Logging
    • View WiFi Networks (logs previously seen)
    • File Explorer & Downloader
    • Command Queuing
    • Built In APK Builder

      Installing L3MON in Kali Linux

    We need Java Runtime Environment 8 and nodejs installed in our machine to run L3mon.

    First we install the JRE (Java Runtime Environment) on our system by applying following command:
    sudo apt-get install openjdk-8-jre
    This command will install JRE version 8 on our system as shown in following screenshot.
    We already have installed JRE
    Then we need to install NodeJs on our system we apply the following commands to download nodejs in our system.
    curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_13.x | sudo bash -
    Then we run following command to install it.
    sudo apt-get install -y nodejs

    Then we install pm2 process manager by using following command:
    sudo npm install pm2 -g
    Now we are ready to install and configure L3MON.

    We download it from it's GitHub by using git clone command:

    wget https://github.com/D3VL/L3MON/releases/download/1.1.2/L3MON-v1.1.2.zip
    This command will download L3MON in our system. Now we create a new folder in our Desktop named L3MON and copy the downloaded zip file there.

    Then extract it by right clicking on the zip file and choosing "extract here".


    Then we open a terminal window and navigate to L3MON in our Desktop by simply using cd command:

    cd /Desktop/L3MON
    Here we install all the dependencies by using following command:

    npm install
    It will install the dependencies now as we can see the the following screenshot:

     

    Let start the server by using following command:
    pm2 start index.js

    Now we can see our server in our browser http://localhost:22533 there will be a login page as following screenshot:



    We create a login for our server here. But we cant login because we did not created a password to login. To create a password we stop our serve by using following command: 

    pm2 stop index.js
     Now we need to edit maindb.json file using our favorite text editor mousepad.

    mousepad maindb.json

    Here we edit the username if we want it. But in the password field, we need to give our password's md5 hash. Means if we fill here the password as plain text, will not work. We must need to put password's md5 hash.

    How to create a md5 hash of a password? Suppose our password is qwerty (This is for an example we shouldn't choose easy passwords for security reasons). To convert it on md5 we need to use following command in another terminal window.

    echo -n "qwerty" | md5sum | cut -d" " -f 1
    Here we got the MD5 hash of our password as we can see in the following screenshot.

    Then we fill our username and password in maindb.json file then save and close this file.

    Now we again start the server by using following command :


    pm2 start index.js
    Then again open our localhost in browser with 22533 port.


    As we set our username kali and password qwerty we fill it and click on login.
    We are successfully logged in.

    Now we are in control. We need to open the APK builder tab.

    Here we put our IP address (local or public) and leave the port as default and click on build.

    Note: If we want to control android device on our local network (same WiFi) then we can use our local IP and to connect devices through internet we need to put our Public IP (Static IP is preferred for a long time use).

    After clicking on build we got an error like this.


    We solved this error by configuring JAVA in another terminal by running following command:

    update-alternatives --config java
    Then we type 2 and enter.
    Then we restart our running L3MON server by using following command:

    pm2 restart all
    Bingo, the error goes now the build is ready to download.

    Now we can download the L3MON.apk in our system, and send it to our targeted device anyway and make a successful installation.

    After a successful installation it on targeted device and the phone user tries to open this L3MON will asks all the permission of devices and automatically hide itself from the app drawer.

    After this we got the connection with the device. We can check it on our Devices tab.

    Now we can control this phone from the manage button. Here in the following screenshot we are in the file manager of the phone. Now we can spy on this phone.

    We are in the file manager of victim device

    Our downloaded data and recorded audio clips will be saved under assets/webpublic/client_downloads/ directory.

    Our discussed method is for local network. To connect a device from internet we prefer to have a static IP address and forward our default port 22533 in our router settings or we can change the default port by changing these lines (inside includes/const.js).

    Using this method we can control phones connected in our same network. We also can control devices through internet by using ngrok services. Configuring L3MON on VPS will make it portable and useful.

    Disclaimer

    Provides no warranty with this software and will not be responsible for any direct or indirect damage caused due to the usage of this tool or this tutorial.
    L3MON is built and our article is documented for both Educational and Internal use ONLY    .

    Getting any problem during installing or configuring L3MON ? Feel free to contact us by commenting with error details on below comment section. For more tutorials like this subscribe our newsletter to get updated. Also we post updates on our Twitter and Medium.
    Share This:
    Facebook Twitter Google+ Pinterest Linkedin

Download Free Fire Mod APK and enjoy it on your Android.","articleBody":"Along with PUBG Mobile, Call of Duty Mobile, and a few other games, Garena Free Fire is currently one of the most famous Battle Royale game on the mobile platform. Featuring unique and exciting survival challenges where you\u2019ll have to compete with dozens of different gamers in a deadly race. Explore your surroundings to look for items and resources. Make uses of them so that you may gain better advantages over your opponents. Challenge each other in an epic competition where only the last survivor can claim the victory. Find out more about this amazing game from GARENA INTERNATIONAL I PRIVATE LIMITED with our reviews. Story In the game, players will join 50 other survivors who find themselves being dropped on a deserted island with weapons and items scattered all over the town. Your ultimate goal in this game is to survive for as long as possible. And to do that, you\u2019ll have to take down your opponents one by one using the weapons that you\u2019ve collected. Along with scavenging around, players are also forced to stay inside the safe circle that keeps shrinking over time. If you stay out of the circle, your health will slowly decrease and you\u2019ll end up dead if you can\u2019t get inside the circle in time. It\u2019s important that you have yourself a good strategy depending on the situations in the game. Be persistent and determined so that you can survive until the last moments. Features Here you\u2019ll find all the exciting features that the game has to offer: Find yourself enjoying the classic Battle Royale gameplay Gamers in Free Fire will have the chances to experience the enjoyable and loved classic Battle Royale gameplay where you\u2019re introduced to the most epic survival challenges. Land yourself in completely strange lands where you\u2019ll have to face up with multiple gamers in a fight for the sole survivor. Roam around collecting weapons and items so you may gain advantages over other players. Try to stay in the safe zone unless you want to be bombarded by powerful napalms that fall from the sky. Look for juicy airdrops that can seriously equip you with amazing weapons and tools. A variety of different weapons and gears to pick up Speaking of which, gamers in Garena Free Fire will find themselves having access to dozens of different types of weapons and equipment, each having its own uses. That being said, you can pick up different weapons and choose between varied approaches to the combats. Grab your melee weapons and quickly strike your opponents at a close range, snipe them with your crazy scopes and sniper, or pick up your machine gun and unleash powerful blasts to the enemies. Awesome vehicles to ride on Another thing with Free Fire is that gamers will find themselves being introduced to multiple vehicles with unique features and powers that you\u2019ve probably never seen before. That being said, you can hop on the powerful motorbikes which come with extreme speeds, take your monster cars which are incredibly tanky to roam the streets, or even drive in a missile-armed vessel that\u2019ll make you almost unbeatable. Compete with online gamers in an epic survival competition Tale up arms and join other gamers from all over the world in this epic survival competition. The game will allow up to 50 players who\u2019re all competing in an epic survival challenge. The whole match will only last for about 10 minutes with you being the last survival. And if you can\u2019t claim your victory, it\u2019ll end much sooner than that. So, the game is definitely suitable for gamers to enjoy a couple of minutes during their limited breaks. Combined with the portability of your mobile devices, the game will be perfect to enjoy for Android gamers. Enjoy exciting team battles with your friends On the other hand, if you prefer a team battle rather than a solo tour, you could join in a random 4-man squad or with friends in the epic team battles. Take the teamwork and tactic elements to a whole new level as you challenge other teams in the exciting survival challenges. And most importantly, in this mode, you can still be revived after being knocked down by other gamers as long as there are still teammates surviving the fight. They could just come up to your place and stand next to you to start reviving you. Your team can only be wiped out if all the members are being killed, which will increase the chance for an epic comeback. Exciting voice chats to help you communicate And to make the game more interactive between gamers, Garena Free Fire also features the awesome voice chat feature which allows gamers to easily communicate with each other. This is particularly helpful when you\u2019re playing in the squad mode, where communication is a vital key to victory. Just simply turn it on and you can start speaking with your teammates, or even provoke your opponents if you want. Unique and interesting costumes to put on your character The game also features awesome costumes that are varied deepening on the styles, themes, and even seasons. That being said, you can easily put on your characters multiple costumes to make them stand out during a fight with the enemies. Free to play The game is currently free to play for Android users and can be easily downloaded on your devices from Google Play Store. And if you want to, you can also pick up the Free Fire Mod APK from our website for an easier installation. Visual and sound quality Graphics You\u2019ll rarely see such a realistic and smooth Battle Royale game on the mobile devices like this game, not to my knowledge. Along with the smooth graphics, the game also features amazing visual effects that\u2019ll take the fights and actions to a whole new level. And if you\u2019re worried about your devices not being strong enough to run the game, then you shouldn\u2019t worry since the adjustable graphics option will be a great help. That being said, you can easily change your graphics preset to a less demanding in the game. That'll make it fairly accessible for gamers on low-end devices. Sound\/Music As for the sound, music, and audio in overall, gamers in Free Fire will never find themselves being distracted from the game thanks to the immersive and satisfying audio effects. Everything is extremely accurate and realistic that it makes you feel like you\u2019re living inside the competition. Experience immersive Battle Royale in Garena Free Fire like never before. How To Install Garena Free Fire APK with OBB data file \tAPK install it on your device, DO NOT open app. \tExtract the OBB file to \/SDCARD\/Android\/obb\/com.dts.freefireth. Ensure that the OBB file (main.2019101300.com.dts.freefireth.obb) sits within the com.dts.freefireth folder. \tStart the game again. Enjoy! Download Garena Free Fire Mod latest 1.51.2 Android APK Free Fire is definitely one of the best Battle Royale game for Android users at the time. With addictive and in-depth gameplay, it\u2019s hard to find another game that could satisfy you like this one, especially when you\u2019re more into the classic Battle Royale games. However, if you\u2019re interested in more refreshing and innovative gameplay like Fortnite, you\u2019ll probably find some of our new games relatively interesting. A few honorable mentions should be Creative Destruction, Super Mecha Champions, Last Day Rules Survival, and so on. data-spai="1" alt="Garena Free Fire poster" width="730" height="384" sizes="(max-width: 730px) 100vw, 730px" /></h2><p>Along with <a href="/pubg-mobile/">PUBG Mobile</a>, <a href="/call-of-duty-mobile/">Call of Duty Mobile</a>, and a few other games, <strong>Garena Free Fire</strong> is currently one of the most famous Battle Royale game on the mobile platform. Featuring unique and exciting survival challenges where youll have to compete with dozens of different gamers in a deadly race.</p><p>Explore your surroundings to look for items and resources. Make uses of them so that you may gain better advantages over your opponents. Challenge each other in an epic competition where only the last survivor can claim the victory.</p><p>Find out more about this amazing game from GARENA INTERNATIONAL I PRIVATE LIMITED with our reviews.</p><h2 id="story" class="ftwp-heading">Story</h2><p>In the game, players will join 50 other survivors who find themselves being dropped on a deserted island with weapons and items scattered all over the town. Your ultimate goal in this game is to survive for as long as possible. And to do that, youll have to take down your opponents one by one using the weapons that youve collected.</p><p>Along with scavenging around, players are also forced to stay inside the safe circle that keeps shrinking over time. If you stay out of the circle, your health will slowly decrease and youll end up dead if you cant get inside the circle in time.</p><p>Its important that you have yourself a good strategy depending on the situations in the game. Be persistent and determined so that you can survive until the last moments.</p><p><img class="aligncenter wp-image-4757" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB2aWV3Qm94PSIwIDAgNjMwIDM5NCIgd2lkdGg9IjYzMCIgaGVpZ2h0PSIzOTQiIGRhdGEtdT0iaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZhcGtkb25lLmNvbSUyRndwLWNvbnRlbnQlMkZ1cGxvYWRzJTJGMjAxOSUyRjA4JTJGZ2FyZW5hLWZyZWUtZmlyZS1zY3JlZW4tMS5qcGciIGRhdGEtdz0iNjMwIiBkYXRhLWg9IjM5NCIgeG1sbnM9Imh0dHA6Ly93d3cudzMub3JnLzIwMDAvc3ZnIj48L3N2Zz4=" data-spai="1" alt="Garena Free Fire screenshot 1" width="730" height="457" sizes="(max-width: 730px) 100vw, 730px" /></p><h2 id="features" class="ftwp-heading">Features</h2><p>Here youll find all the exciting features that the game has to offer:</p><h3 id="find-yourself-enjoying-the-classic-battle-royale-gameplay" class="ftwp-heading">Find yourself enjoying the classic Battle Royale gameplay</h3><p>Gamers in Free Fire will have the chances to experience the enjoyable and loved classic Battle Royale gameplay where youre introduced to the most epic survival challenges. Land yourself in completely strange lands where youll have to face up with multiple gamers in a fight for the sole survivor. Roam around collecting weapons and items so you may gain advantages over other players.</p><p>Try to stay in the safe zone unless you want to be bombarded by powerful napalms that fall from the sky. Look for juicy airdrops that can seriously equip you with amazing weapons and tools.</p><p><img class="aligncenter wp-image-4755" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB2aWV3Qm94PSIwIDAgNjMwIDM5NCIgd2lkdGg9IjYzMCIgaGVpZ2h0PSIzOTQiIGRhdGEtdT0iaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZhcGtkb25lLmNvbSUyRndwLWNvbnRlbnQlMkZ1cGxvYWRzJTJGMjAxOSUyRjA4JTJGZ2FyZW5hLWZyZWUtZmlyZS1zY3JlZW4tMy5qcGciIGRhdGEtdz0iNjMwIiBkYXRhLWg9IjM5NCIgeG1sbnM9Imh0dHA6Ly93d3cudzMub3JnLzIwMDAvc3ZnIj48L3N2Zz4=" data-spai="1" alt="Garena Free Fire screenshot 3" width="730" height="457" sizes="(max-width: 730px) 100vw, 730px" /></p><h3 id="a-variety-of-different-weapons-and-gears-to-pick-up" class="ftwp-heading">A variety of different weapons and gears to pick up</h3><p>Speaking of which, gamers in Garena Free Fire will find themselves having access to dozens of different types of weapons and equipment, each having its own uses. That being said, you can pick up different weapons and choose between varied approaches to the combats. Grab your melee weapons and quickly strike your opponents at a close range, snipe them with your crazy scopes and sniper, or pick up your machine gun and unleash powerful blasts to the enemies.</p><h3 id="awesome-vehicles-to-ride-on" class="ftwp-heading">Awesome vehicles to ride on</h3><p>Another thing with Free Fire is that gamers will find themselves being introduced to multiple vehicles with unique features and powers that youve probably never seen before. That being said, you can hop on the powerful motorbikes which come with extreme speeds, take your monster cars which are incredibly tanky to roam the streets, or even drive in a missile-armed vessel thatll make you almost unbeatable.</p><h3 id="compete-with-online-gamers-in-an-epic-survival-competition" class="ftwp-heading">Compete with online gamers in an epic survival competition</h3><p>Tale up arms and join other gamers from all over the world in this epic survival competition. The game will allow up to 50 players whore all competing in an epic survival challenge. The whole match will only last for about 10 minutes with you being the last survival.</p><p>And if you cant claim your victory, itll end much sooner than that. So, the game is definitely suitable for gamers to enjoy a couple of minutes during their limited breaks. Combined with the portability of your mobile devices, the game will be perfect to enjoy for Android gamers.</p><p><img class="aligncenter wp-image-4754" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB2aWV3Qm94PSIwIDAgNjMwIDM5NCIgd2lkdGg9IjYzMCIgaGVpZ2h0PSIzOTQiIGRhdGEtdT0iaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZhcGtkb25lLmNvbSUyRndwLWNvbnRlbnQlMkZ1cGxvYWRzJTJGMjAxOSUyRjA4JTJGZ2FyZW5hLWZyZWUtZmlyZS1zY3JlZW4tNC5qcGciIGRhdGEtdz0iNjMwIiBkYXRhLWg9IjM5NCIgeG1sbnM9Imh0dHA6Ly93d3cudzMub3JnLzIwMDAvc3ZnIj48L3N2Zz4=" data-spai="1" alt="Garena Free Fire screenshot 4" width="730" height="457" sizes="(max-width: 730px) 100vw, 730px" /></p><h3 id="enjoy-exciting-team-battles-with-your-friends" class="ftwp-heading">Enjoy exciting team battles with your friends</h3><p>On the other hand, if you prefer a team battle rather than a solo tour, you could join in a random 4-man squad or with friends in the epic team battles. Take the teamwork and tactic elements to a whole new level as you challenge other teams in the exciting survival challenges.</p><p>And most importantly, in this mode, you can still be revived after being knocked down by other gamers as long as there are still teammates surviving the fight. They could just come up to your place and stand next to you to start reviving you. Your team can only be wiped out if all the members are being killed, which will increase the chance for an epic comeback.</p><h3 id="exciting-voice-chats-to-help-you-communicate" class="ftwp-heading">Exciting voice chats to help you communicate</h3><p>And to make the game more interactive between gamers, Garena Free Fire also features the awesome voice chat feature which allows gamers to easily communicate with each other. This is particularly helpful when youre playing in the squad mode, where communication is a vital key to victory. Just simply turn it on and you can start speaking with your teammates, or even provoke your opponents if you want.</p><h3 id="unique-and-interesting-costumes-to-put-on-your-character" class="ftwp-heading">Unique and interesting costumes to put on your character</h3><p>The game also features awesome costumes that are varied deepening on the styles, themes, and even seasons. That being said, you can easily put on your characters multiple costumes to make them stand out during a fight with the enemies.</p><p><img class="aligncenter wp-image-4756" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB2aWV3Qm94PSIwIDAgNjMwIDM5NCIgd2lkdGg9IjYzMCIgaGVpZ2h0PSIzOTQiIGRhdGEtdT0iaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZhcGtkb25lLmNvbSUyRndwLWNvbnRlbnQlMkZ1cGxvYWRzJTJGMjAxOSUyRjA4JTJGZ2FyZW5hLWZyZWUtZmlyZS1zY3JlZW4tMi5qcGciIGRhdGEtdz0iNjMwIiBkYXRhLWg9IjM5NCIgeG1sbnM9Imh0dHA6Ly93d3cudzMub3JnLzIwMDAvc3ZnIj48L3N2Zz4=" data-spai="1" alt="Garena Free Fire screenshot 2" width="730" height="457" sizes="(max-width: 730px) 100vw, 730px" /></p><h3 id="free-to-play" class="ftwp-heading">Free to play</h3><p>The game is currently free to play for Android users and can be easily downloaded on your devices from <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dts.freefireth" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Google Play Store</a>. And if you want to, you can also pick up the <strong>Free Fire Mod APK</strong> from <a href="/">our website</a> for an easier installation.</p><h2 id="visual-and-sound-quality" class="ftwp-heading">Visual and sound quality</h2><h3 id="graphics" class="ftwp-heading">Graphics</h3><p>Youll rarely see such a realistic and smooth Battle Royale game on the mobile devices like this game, not to my knowledge.
